statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 1 \\ -1 \\ 3 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 1 \\ -4 \\ -2 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -10 \\ 4 \\ -7 \\ 7 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 20 \\ -14 \\ 32 \\ -12 \\ 10 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
